Text: Ask (The Smiths song):  It was released as a single on 20 October 1986 through Rough Trade Records.

Text: Ask (The Smiths song):  Its lyrics touch on shyness and encourages the listener to release their inhibitions.

Text: Ask (The Smiths song):  Its multiple guitar parts and complex production led to disagreements regarding its final mix.
Triplets:<Ask
5:
Text: Ask (The Smiths song):  In addition, Craig Gannon, one-time rhythm guitarist for the group, has claimed he wrote and was denied credit for the song's chord structure.
